title: My Kind of Forever
description: Liam Page knows music and a life of solitude, but that all changed when he returned to Beaumont. The once notorious bad boy lead singer of 4225 West is now living the domesticated life with his wife and high school sweetheart, Josie, and their son, Noah. Life is good for the Westbury family, until Liam is called back to Los Angeles and the place where it all started for him.  Liam and Josie's story continues in this last installment of The Beaumont Series.
author: Heidi McLaughlin
